data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Todaro, M. Antonio (2013): A new non-naked species of Ptychostomella (Gastrotricha) from Brazil. ZooKeys 289: 13-24, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.289.4683, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.289.4683
